alert.note: Alert for Beadle (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:12PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Huron. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, approximately 16000 acres of agricultural land around Huron will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.4 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon James River Huron 11.0 15.2 Fri 8 pm 15.4 15.0 14.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday.
